description: {"blocks":[{"key":"99cs","text":"This is a protocol for the direct conversion of human primary fibroblasts into neurons using a combination of transcription factor- and small molecule-based approach. The majority of converted neurons showing characteristics of cortical glutamatergic neurons.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9oer3","text":"1. Fibroblast medium @4°C lasts for 1 month. A total of 500 mL:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mktu","text":"435 ml DMEM (High glucose, GlutaMAX) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qc2j","text":"50 ml Fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k1ba","text":"5 ml Penicillin-Streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"108p9","text":"5 ml MEM NEAA (100X; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djo96","text":"5 ml Sodium pyruvate (100 mM; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3el6e","text":"0.5 ml beta-mercaptoethanol (55mM; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ikso","text":"Sterilized by filtration through a 0.22 µm filter","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4i3sr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qj8o","text":"2. Neuronal reprogramming medium @4°C lasts for 1 month. A total of 500 mL:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8k92","text":"240 mL DMEM/F-12 (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kgcf","text":"240 mL Neurobasal Medium (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1p9pg","text":"10 mL B-27 Supplement (50X) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnpso","text":"5 mL N-2 Supplement (100X) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11fp0","text":"1.25 mL GlutaMAX Supplement (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vpk9","text":"5 ml Penicillin-Streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dk58m","text":"Sterilized by filtration through a 0.22 µm filter","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83j67","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9grqp","text":"3. Neuronal maturation medium @4°C lasts for 1 month. A total of 500 mL:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c071o","text":"480 mL BrainPhys Neuronal Medium (STEMCELL Technologies)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqmli","text":"10 mL B-27 Supplement (50X) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35aho","text":"5 mL N-2 Supplement (100X) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4ogo","text":"1.25 mL GlutaMAX Supplement (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jhf8","text":"5 ml Penicillin-Streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s0p","text":"Sterilized by filtration through a 0.22 µm filter","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tkmm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqjdc","text":"4. Hexadimethrine Bromide (Polybrene) (Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f5cj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpdsi","text":"5. Forskolin (Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2usvo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehrfp","text":"6. Dorsomorphin (Tocris)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd3c2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3crpm","text":"7. SB 431542 (Tocris)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djde5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a42t6","text":"8. XAV939 (Stemgent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20h08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41tk1","text":"9. Doxycycline (Cayman)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dma9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"oant","text":"10. Puromycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56ia7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fo06","text":"11. BDNF Recombinant Protein (Peprotech)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cvf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"434ke","text":"12. NT-3 Recombinant Protein (Peprotech)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12d9p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tghc","text":"13. Poly-L-ornithine hydrobromide (Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2o24","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b46bn","text":"14. Human rhLaminin-521 (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uvsl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25k07","text":"15. Human Vitronectin (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9e0qm","text":"Day -1: Plate human fibroblasts at 200K cells per well of a poly-L-ornithine coated 6-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54ol0","text":"Dilute sterile-filtered 0.01% poly-L-ornithine in PBS at a 1-to-10 ratio.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dkv0i","text":"Coat the plate and incubate in a 37°C incubator for 2 hr.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59lko","text":"Wash the plate with H2O for 5 min on a shaker and repeat for three times. Airdry the plate before plating the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bppjg","text":"Day 0: Infect cells with 2 mL of viral supernatants per well of a 6-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2e63","text":"Make virus dilutions by adding each viral supernatant to cold Fibroblast medium. 100 to 400 µL of each viral supernatant (M2rtTA, Ngn2-puro, Ascl1, Brn2, Myt1l) depending on viral titers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mut3","text":"Combine these viral supernatants and add cold Fibroblast medium to reach a total of 12 mL for one 6-well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"305co","text":"Add 4 µg/mL Polybrene to the virus dilutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1q081","text":"Remove old Fibroblast medium and incubate cells with virus dilutions for 24 hr.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95vqs","text":"Day 1: Remove virus-containing medium and add fresh Fibroblast medium plus 1 µg/mL doxycycline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aaspt","text":"Day 2: Change to fresh Fibroblast medium plus doxycycline and puromycin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpe45","text":"Day 4: Coat glass coverslips or plates with Vitronectin/rLaminin-521 and replate the transduced cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vq4s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3oits","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c5p53","text":"The conversion efficiency and cell survival are much better after replating as compared with no replating.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3plfh","text":"Coat with vitronectin (1:100 dilution of stock concentration 0.5 mg/mL in PBS) for 1 hr at room temperature. No need to rinse for vitronectin-coating coverslips or plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4l3ge","text":"Coat with rhLaminin-521 (1:100 dilution of stock concentration 100 μg/mL in DPBS with Ca2+ and Mg2+) for 2 hr at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":88,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":97,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fjir3","text":"In parallel, trypsinize cells by 0.05% Trypsin-EDTA for 5 min at 37°C and perform PSA-NCAM selection using magnetic-based cell sorting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mg3s","text":"Replate the PSA-NCAM+ cells in Fibroblast medium plus doxycycline. Generally ~50K cells per cm2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":94,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qf36","text":"Day 5: Switch to Neuronal reprogramming medium plus small molecules.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3839m","text":"5 µM Forskolin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"horg","text":"2 µM Dorsomorphin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es5gk","text":"10 µM SB 431542","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mfeb","text":"2 µM XAV939","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9511h","text":"1 µg/mL Doxycycline","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d0l4d","text":"Change half of the culture medium every 2 to 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60dvt","text":"Day 12, Switch to Neuronal reprogramming medium supplemented with small molecules and neurotrophic factors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"125mm","text":"5 µM Forskolin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mnpk","text":"2 µM Dorsomorphin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mr9q","text":"10 µM SB 431542","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34li6","text":"2 µM XAV939","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vqhm","text":"1 µg/mL Doxycycline","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mclg","text":"10 ng/mL BDNF","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq4ag","text":"10 ng/mL NT-3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"51o5t","text":"Change half of the culture medium every 2 to 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4po5","text":"Day 20, switch to Neuronal maturation medium supplemented with small molecules and neurotrophic factors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97sj7","text":"5 µM Forskolin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"224b5","text":"2 µM Dorsomorphin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qulf","text":"10 µM SB 431542","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr157","text":"1 µg/mL Doxycycline","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pca7","text":"10 ng/mL BDNF","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atrjl","text":"10 ng/mL NT-3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7e1h4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en2q8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f5omt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"68vlb","text":"Suggest half medium change to gradually replace the neuronal reprogramming medium with maturation medium. This reduces the exposure of neurons to the air.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cljle","text":"Change half of the culture medium every 3 to 4 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jq17","text":"Neurons will mature on and after 5 weeks in culture and be ready for experiments","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fttsc","text":"Neurons can be cultured for about 9 weeks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ef0lq","text":"Rinse the cells with sterile 1x PBS to remove all complete medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ilo7","text":"Add 0.05% Trypsin-EDTA to cover the bottom of the dish. Incubate at 37°C with 5% CO2 for ~5 minutes. Cells should round up and become dislodged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"930n","text":"Neutralize trypsin-EDTA activity by adding the complete media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8uirr","text":"Gently pipette to resuspend the cells and transfer the cell-containing medium to a 15 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b3s2i","text":"Centrifuge at 200xG for 5 min to pellet the cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fskt4","text":"Add fresh culture medium to adjust the cell concentration to 200K cells per well and each well contain 2 mL of culture medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7j3f2","text":"Remove the supernatant. Cell numbers are determined for each sample by a hemocytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Neuronal transdifferentiation from human primary adult fibroblasts
title_html: Neuronal transdifferentiation from human primary adult fibroblasts
